longTitle.p: COUNCIL DECISION (EU) 2020/234of 17 February 2020appointing an alternate member, proposed by the Kingdom of Denmark, of the Committee of the Regions

formula.name: actingEntity
formula.p: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

citation.p: Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Danish Government,

recital.p:
On 10 December 2019, 20 January 2020 and 3 February 2020, the Council adopted Decisions (EU) 2019/2157
Council Decision (EU) 2019/2157 of 10 December 2019 appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2020 to 25 January 2025 (OJ L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 78)., (EU) 2020/102
Council Decision (EU) 2020/102 of 20 January 2020 appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2020 to 25 January 2025 (OJ L 20, 24.1.2020, p. 2). and (EU) 2020/144
Council Decision (EU) 2020/144 of 3 February 2020 appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2020 to 25 January 2025 (OJ L 32, 4.2.2020, p. 16). appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2020 to 25 January 2025.
An alternate member's seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Ms Ursula Beate DIETERICH-PEDERSEN,

content.p: The following is hereby appointed as an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2025:
Ms Vibeke Syppli ENRUM, Member of a Regional Assembly: Regionsr√•det, Region Syddanmark.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
